text: Yes, Lab 01 will be more specific, as Nathanael mentioned. Just note that Lab 00 is practice for the other labs, so be sure and include some written text for each screenshot, and above each screenshot, to get into the habit of doing so.

text: For Breakpoint 04, do you want us to also list the hard drive space we have on our PC? For the specifications it lists that we may need 100GB or more of free space.

elements.text: For Breakpoint 04, do you want us to also list the hard drive space we have on our PC? For the specifications it lists that we may need 100GB or more of free space.

text: Hi Joshua: Great question! We did not ask for hard drive space. But this is an important point. For this class, we did not stipulate hard drive space, but sometimes, folks do run out of space when installing software, and need to move some of their files to another location. It's good to be aware of your hard drive space, and just as importantly, how much free space you currently have. You need 25 GB for the virtual machine installation in Lab 01, for example.

elements.text: Hi Joshua: Great question! We did not ask for hard drive space. But this is an important point. For this class, we did not stipulate hard drive space, but sometimes, folks do run out of space when installing software, and need to move some of their files to another location. It's good to be aware of your hard drive space, and just as importantly, how much free space you currently have. You need 25 GB for the virtual machine installation in Lab 01, for example.
